name: Rust Programming
content: Rust is a systems programming language focused on safety, speed, and concurrency.

name: Database Systems
content: Databases are organized collections of data that can be easily accessed, managed, and updated.

name: Vector Embeddings
content: Vector embeddings are dense numerical representations of data that capture semantic meaning.

name: RocksDB Overview
content: RocksDB is an embeddable persistent key-value store optimized for fast storage.

name: Semantic Search
content: Semantic search improves search accuracy by understanding the intent and contextual meaning of search queries.
